DOC.brief_summary: Current research show dairy protein accelerate infant weight gain , risk factor later obesity metabolic syndrome . However , dietary protein source n't study yet . This longitudinal study compare two complementary feed regimen dietary protein mainly 1 ) meat ; 2 ) dairy infant growth , body composition gut microbiome 5 12 month age formula feed infant . Healthy infant approximately 5 month age randomize either meat protein , dairy protein group complementary protein mainly meat dairy . Infants consume one diet 7 month ( 6-12 month age ) infant growth , body composition , growth biomarkers gut microbiome measure compare group time .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Protein From Complementary Foods Infant Growth , Body Composition Gut Health
DOC.detailed_description: Two observational follow-up visit conduct 18 24 month age .
